rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;4e75bb45.1411">   <title>OER15 in Cardiff: Mainstreaming Open Education - call for abstracts E-X-T-E-N-D-E-D to 1 Dec </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;4e75bb45.1411</link>   <description> I am forwarding this on behalf of the planning group for the OER15 Conference which is happening in Cardiff 14-15 April 2015.<br><br>You may particularly like to note the inclusivity fund available to assist participation from some groups!<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>*******<br><br>Dear colleague,<br><br>OER15: Mainstreaming Open Education<br><br>This is a reminder of the call for abstracts at OER15. *The call for abstracts has been extended to Monday 1 Dec* So plenty of extra opportunity for staff in Wales to submit their idea. All you need to put in is 500 words. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-26T15:22:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;4e75bb45.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;e782e9f1.1411">   <title>Shameless plug: new Research Methods iBooks Textbook </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;e782e9f1.1411</link>   <description> Hi, folks<br><br>I hope you will forgive this shameless plug for our new publication: Research Methods for Business Students, Managers and Entrepreneurs&lt;http://bit.ly/USWResearchMethods&gt;.<br><br>Of course there are many books and ebooks on Research Methods (even a couple of static iBooks), however this is the first media-rich, Multi-Touch iBooks Textbook on this subject in the world. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-18T17:53:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sue Burnett</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;e782e9f1.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;154179c.1411">   <title>Event: 20 Nov 2014: Making Connections: Exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales (Carmarthen) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;154179c.1411</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>This is being sent to several appropriate lists, with apologies for any cross-posting.<br><br>I am forwarding the event below on behalf of Debbie Baff at the OER Wales Cymru project. Feel free to circulate to interested colleagues. Please contact the project directly with any queries. Booking information and contact details are available at the links below. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T16:45:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;154179c.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;ad0d4194.1411">   <title>CORRECTION: Call for abstracts and contributions to the OER15 conference \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMainstreaming Open Education\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;ad0d4194.1411</link>   <description> The email below which was sent out last week had an error in one of the URLs. The conference website for the OER15 Conference in Cardiff, 14-15 April, is confirmed as http://oer15.oerconf.org/. Please use this email when telling colleauges about the event. Thankyou!<br><br>Colleagues,<br><br>See below for details of a forthcoming conference in Cardiff which will provide an opportunity for staff and organisations in Wales to showcase work they are doing in the area of OER (Open Educational Resources) and Open Educational Practice (if you're new to these terms, you may find this a useful source http://www.jiscinfonet.ac.uk/infokits/oer/). [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-03T10:10:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;ad0d4194.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;9a153001.1410">   <title>FW: Call for abstracts and contributions to the OER15 conference \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMainstreaming Open Education\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;9a153001.1410</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>See below for details of a forthcoming conference in Cardiff which will provide an opportunity for staff and organisations in Wales to showcase work they are doing in the area of OER (Open Educational Resources) and Open Educational Practice (if you're new to these terms, you may find this a useful source http://www.jiscinfonet.ac.uk/infokits/oer/). [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-31T15:13:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;9a153001.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;bf8f2f2c.1410">   <title>FW: CoPILOT comes to Cardiff [event aimed at librarians who teach information literacy] </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;bf8f2f2c.1410</link>   <description> Librarians and others who support or teach information literacy skills and related academic skills (research skills, study skills) are welcome to join in the following free event in Cardiff. Please forward to interested colleagues.<br><br>To find out more about OER (open educational resources) you may like to visit the Jisc Open Educational Resources infoKit http://www.jiscinfonet.ac.uk/infokits/oer/. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-23T08:00:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;bf8f2f2c.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410">   <title>Free event: Making connections: exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm forwarding this on behald of the OER Wales Cymru project. It\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds one of a series of free opportunities this term relating to open educational practice in Wales. Feel free to circulate to any interested staff in your networks.<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>*****<br><br>Making connections: exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-13T13:54:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8d7b18f7.1410">   <title>Message to E-learning Wales from Jisc RSC Wales. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8d7b18f7.1410</link>   <description> Message to E-learning Wales from Jisc RSC Wales.<br><br>You may be aware Jisc is currently undergoing a period of transition designed to streamline the organisation, reduce duplication and protect the quality and integrity of its services. We are now at the stage where the Customer Services Division is being reshaped. Pete Scott was appointed to the role of Director Jisc Group Customer Services in April this year and reports to Robert Haymon-Collins as Executive Director, Customer Experience. Robert has published a blog post that gives an overview of the "reshaping" exercise that can be found at: http://www.jisc.ac.uk/blog/towards-a-new-look-customer-service-function-for-jisc-01-jul-2014. The new service [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-08T15:09:33+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8d7b18f7.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;64e292a7.1409">   <title>LinkedIn for Education 20.11.2014 - Free event - Treforest </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;64e292a7.1409</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>Below is a free event open to all, offered by University of South Wales. Please book via the University of South Wales, link below.<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>Sent from my iPad<br><br>Begin forwarded message:    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-17T14:04:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;64e292a7.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;f8cf2558.1409">   <title>News release: 400 colleges gain access to free e-text books </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;f8cf2558.1409</link>   <description> Jisc Press Release<br><br>Having problems viewing this email? See our online&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/q/1126AMAjJRDSaZ8rzsW/wv&gt; version.<br><br>[http://jisc.msgfocus.com/files/amf_jisc/project_1/Headers/header_shadow.jpg]<br><br>News release<br>1 September 2014<br><br>400 colleges gain access to free e-text books<br><br>Jisc offers over 400 colleges free access to a new collection of curriculum focused e-text books through e-books for FE&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/13faNuEwKew4uN5lF0EwE&gt;.<br><br>E-books for FE will be benefiting UK further education providers by offering access to an additional new suite of 168 e-text books. These books will supplement over 200 other e-text books previously acquired. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-01T12:13:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;f8cf2558.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;a66e6aa3.1408">   <title>FW: Call for papers: '#design4learning: from blended learning to learning analytics in HE': Conference at the OU, Milton Keynes on 26-27 November 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;a66e6aa3.1408</link>   <description> Heads up on a conference that looks relevant to a number of staff in Welsh post-16 institutions and education bodies. The call for papers closes 15 Sept.<br><br>Any queries please contact the organisers (details below).<br><br>Regards,<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>[this message has been sent to the lists: rsc-wales-higher-ed, wales-ltf, elearning-wales and whelf.]<br><br>From: Announcement list for Cetis [mailto:CETIS-ANNOUNCE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Christina Smart<br>Sent: 27 August 2014 11:07<br>To: CETIS-ANNOUNCE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Call for papers: '#design4learning: from blended learning to learning analytics in HE': Conference at the OU, Milton Keynes on 26-27 November 2014 [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-27T10:19:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;a66e6aa3.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;e506a8af.1407">   <title>FW: Jisc FE Digital Student Study </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;e506a8af.1407</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>This is to let FE colleagues know about the following invitation from Jisc. We hope that some of you will be interested in taking advantage of this opportunity. The deadline for responses is 30 July. Please use the online form provided below to register your interest.<br><br>Regards,<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Senior E-learning Advisor<br>Jisc RSC Wales [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-11T05:28:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;e506a8af.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;cb7d9640.1406">   <title>Event reminder: Jisc Digital resources for FE - free workshops in North and South Wales </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;cb7d9640.1406</link>   <description> Jisc Digital Resources for FE - workshops<br><br>This workshop aims to highlight the wide range of digital content provided by Jisc for the FE community. You will be given tours and demos around some of the key content services available, including: MediaHub, Jorum and the upcoming Digimap for Colleges.<br><br>Target Audience - Any practitioner in Further Education who uses - or is interested in using - Jisc Digital Content in their teaching and learning. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-20T15:24:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;cb7d9640.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8481dd02.1405">   <title>ALT Free Webinars </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8481dd02.1405</link>   <description> Open Educational Resources: the Welsh Experience - a free webinar: June 5th, 13.00-13.45.<br>Paul Richardson (Jisc RSC Wales) and Debbie Baff (OER Wales Cymru)<br><br>This webinar will describe some recent developments in Open Educational Resources (OER) in Wales and beyond. Last year, a working group was set up by the Welsh Government to consider possible approaches to OER and MOOCs. Its report highlights some key initiatives and agendas, and these will be discussed in more detail. At the same time, Higher Education Wales published a Declaration of Intent, committing Welsh universities the promotion and use of OER to further several [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-23T09:48:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kelly H.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8481dd02.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;9467b152.1405">   <title>Jisc RSC South West TurboTEL </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;9467b152.1405</link>   <description> Good afternoon<br><br>Our colleagues in Jisc RSC South West are running a TurboTEL event on 10th June at the University West of England. The event is free to attend. See below for further information and details of how to book your place.<br><br>&quot;TurboTEL is back, offering a fantastic and diverse range of &quot;info-byte&quot; style presentations and exhibitions of interest to the entire post-compulsory education community...and it is still FREE! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-21T10:51:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;9467b152.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;1faf85f0.1405">   <title>Applications for Jisc's Summer of Student Innovation 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;1faf85f0.1405</link>   <description> I would like to remind you that the closing date for Jisc's Summer of Student Innovation 2014 is 30th May 2014. The programme offers students the chance to create real technology solutions to improve education, research and student life. Successful applications will benefit from \ufffd\ufffd5000 to turn their idea into reality. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-12T11:21:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kelly H.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;1faf85f0.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;3daef342.1404">   <title>Reminder: Jisc RSC Wales HE forum - 7 May 2014 - focus on meeting student needs in a digital world </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;3daef342.1404</link>   <description> This is a last call for bookings for the Jisc RSC Wales HE Forum event on Wednesday 7 May 2014 in Llandrindod. If you haven't yet signed up, you can still do so by Friday 2 May.<br><br>The forum is for you if you are engaged in, managing or leading change with technology to enhance the higher education experience in Wales. This includes library and information services staff, academic staff, academic and professional developers, learning technologists and other professional roles. It includes staff working not only in universities but also colleges and Higher Education organisations. Representatives of key HE sector [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-28T07:47:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;3daef342.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8364f291.1404">   <title>Managing Change: a forum on the role of technology in Higher Education in Wales - Jisc RSC Wales event </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8364f291.1404</link>   <description> Managing Change: a forum on the role of technology in Higher Education in Wales<br><br>Wednesday, 7 May 2014 10:30 - 15:30 with coffee/registration from 10.00.<br><br>Location: Media Resource Centre&lt;http://www.mrc-wales.net/location.htm&gt;, Llandrindod Wells LD1 6AH<br><br>This free one-day event is for all staff in Welsh Higher Education (universities, colleges or sector organisations) who would like to [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-08T12:02:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELEARNING-WALES;8364f291.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
